description: OPINION AND ORDER    re:  33     MOTION  to Dismiss Complaint. filed by   Shed Media US Inc., Darren  Ward, Lisa  Shannon,   NBCUniversal Media, LLC,   Bravo Media LLC,   Warner Bros. Discovery, Inc., John  Paparazzo, Andy  Cohen,  57     MOTI ON  to Dismiss First Amended Complaint. filed by   Shed Media US Inc., Darren  Ward, Lisa  Shannon,   NBCUniversal Media, LLC,   Bravo Media LLC, John  Paparazzo,   Warner Bros.  Discovery, Inc., Andy  Cohen.  The motion to dismiss is GRANTED  IN PART and DENIED IN  PART. A summary table reflecting the outcome of Defendants' motion is included below at  Appendix I. Any motion to file an amended pleading must be filed within two weeks of the  date of this Opinion and Order and must be  consistent with this Opinion and Order. The  motion to dismiss the Complaint at Dkt. No. 33 is dismissed as moot in light of the filing  of the First Amended Complaint. The Clerk of Court is respectfully directed to close Dkt.  Nos. 33 and 57. SO ORDERED.    (Signed by Judge Lewis J. Liman on 3/31/2025)   (ks)
